attributes.title: TERRIBLE APP 😡😡😡
attributes.review: I had to get a new phone after this HORRIBLE app ruined my entire phone! It’s super glitchy and unreliable and it’s full of HACKERS!! This is the worst app I’ve ever downloaded i STRONGLY do NOT recommend it!!!!!!!

attributes.title: Worst app ever
attributes.review: I downloaded this app and I went inside and I seen disgusting stuff my mine was blonde please get this off the app page please this is not for kids eye

attributes.title: The Worst!
attributes.review: I have never seen a more terrible app! And trust me I am an app expert. I have studied many apps and this one, is horrible. We will ban this app, and make America a little better.

attributes.title: i hate this app
attributes.review: this app hacked my phone and would NOT STOP spamming something called fairy comments to my phone. it leaked my phone number and violated my privacy.

attributes.title: 🤢 🤮Terrible person and app🤮🤢
attributes.review: This stole my time, money, and I saw very disturbing photos of a Cheeto. if I wanted to see photos of a Cheeto I could’ve looked on google or took photos myself. 🤢🤢🤢🤢🤮🤮🤮🤮🤮🤮🤮🤮🤮🤮🤮🤮🤮🤮

attributes.title: I’m scared
attributes.review:
If u guys really want people to download this app you should really remove the scary Cheeto lookin monkey on the front😊
Just fyi course Halloween is in October not June so maybe wait till then to scare people like that☺️

attributes.title: Horrifying
attributes.review: This app is not what I expected when I downloaded it thinking it was going to be trump I saw a nasty orange man in a suit my daughter saw this and started crying, would not recommend 😡

attributes.title: DumpTrump2020
attributes.review: This is the worst app to ever exist. Upon opening the app I was called the n word and told to go back to my country. The blatant racism, xenophobia, homophobia, and misogyny within this app is appalling. Take this off the App Store!!!

attributes.title: horrible app
attributes.review: This app has to be one of the most misleading forms of propaganda i’ve ever seen. it’s just very very ugly and should be removed from the app store immediately.

attributes.title: no ✋i 😔am 😀gonna 😭leave 😪➡️
attributes.review: i physically GAGGED opening this app. thanks to THIS i had to go to the er because i was throwing up so much oh my god please no. i can’t stand to look at him😡 sorry😪 but it’s a no for me 🧐 GROSS I HATE IT
